subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The teenager Madison Brengle and the former South African player Liezel Huber could appear for the star-deprived United States team in the Fed Cup semifinals against Russia. Brengle, an 18-year-old from Dover, Del., was one of the four players chosen to represent the Americans next weekend in Moscow in the best-of-five series.
